activities: Merchantry operates software as a service information technology system that process orders from various web sites around the world and sends those orders to other organizations that will fulfill them.  As part of normal business operations, Merchantry collects customer’s information with respect to name, address, phone and e-mail so that the items they purchased can be shipped to them. This data is only used to process the order but is maintained in our systems to facilitate order history and return functionality for the customer.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The only information processed is customer name, address, phone number and e-mail addres
